.w-richtext a, .paragraph-xlarge a, .paragraph-large a, .paragraph-medium a, .paragraph-small a, .label-regular a, .label-medium a, .caption-medium a, .caption-small a { color: var(--indigo-500-main); font-weight: 500; transition: color 0.2s; }

.caption[color="dark"] { background-color: var(--indigo-700); color: var(--indigo-300); }

.caption[color="white"] { background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); color: var(--indigo-500-main); }

.caption[color="pink"] { background-color: var(--pink-200); color: var(--pink-600); }

.caption[color="glass"] .caption-small, .caption[color="glass"] .caption-medium { background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgb(255, 255, 255) 0%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.19) 100%) text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; }

ul::marker, ol::marker { content: ""; }

li::before { position: absolute; left: -1rem; }

ol li::before { content: counter(listCounter, decimal-leading-zero); color: var(--indigo-500-main); font-weight: 500; min-width: 1.4375rem; }

li ol li::before { content: counter(listCounter, lower-alpha); }

ul li::before { content: "•"; font-size: 1.295rem; color: var(--indigo-500-main); }

.hero-video-fade-container { mask-image: radial-gradient(265% 100% at center top, white 80%, transparent 90%); mask-size: auto 200%; }

.hero-video-fade-container[hero-video-fade="true"] { margin-bottom: -15%; mask-position: 50% 99%; transition: mask-position 0.75s, margin-bottom 1.5s; }

.hero-video-fade-container[hero-video-fade="false"] { margin-bottom: 0%; mask-position: center top; transition: mask-position 1.5s, margin-bottom 0.75s; }

[fade-top="null"] .html-video, img[fade-top="null"], [fade-left="null"] .html-video, img[fade-left="null"] { mask-image: unset !important; mask-size: unset !important; mask-position: unset !important; }

[fade-top] .html-video, img[fade-top], [fade-left] .html-video, img[fade-left] { mask-image: linear-gradient(transparent 0%, rgb(0, 0, 0) 15%); mask-size: 101% 101%; mask-position: center bottom; transition: 1s; }

[fade-top="false"] .html-video, [fade-left="false"] .html-video { mask-size: 101% 125%; }

@media screen and (min-width: 992px) {
  [fade-left] .html-video, img[fade-left] { mask-image: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent 0%, rgb(0, 0, 0) 15%); mask-position: right center; }
  [grid-order="reversed"] [fade-left] .html-video, [grid-order="reversed"] img[fade-left] { mask-image: linear-gradient(-90deg, transparent 0%, rgb(0, 0, 0) 15%); mask-position: left center; }
  [fade-left="false"] .html-video { mask-size: 125% 101%; }
}</style><style rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">@charset "utf-8";

* { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; }

a, .w-nav-link, .w-dropdown-btn, .w-dropdown-toggle, .w-dropdown-link, .w-tab-link { color: inherit; }

.w-richtext > :first-child { margin-top: 0px; }

.w-richtext > :last-child, .w-richtext ol li:last-child, .w-richtext ul li:last-child { margin-bottom: 0px; }

.div-square::after { content: ""; display: block; padding-bottom: 100%; }

main:focus-visible { outline: -webkit-focus-ring-color auto 0px; }

.table-fade-right { display: none; background-image: linear-gradient(270deg, rgb(255, 255, 255) 50%, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)); width: 1.25rem; position: absolute; inset: 0px 0px 0px auto; z-index: 1; }

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .table-component { margin-left: -1.25rem; margin-right: -1.25rem; padding-left: 1.25rem; padding-right: 1.25rem; }
  .table-container { margin-left: -1.25rem; margin-right: -1.25rem; padding-left: 1.25rem; padding-right: 1.25rem; overflow: scroll; }
  .table-wrapper { display: inline-block; }

table { min-width: 100%; overflow: hidden; border: .0625rem solid var(--grey-200); border-radius: 0.75rem; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0px; }

thead { background-color: var(--grey-100); }

th { border-top: none; border-bottom: .0625rem solid var(--grey-200); color: var(--grey-700); text-align: left; padding: 1.25rem 1rem; font-family: "Basiersquare Webfont", sans-serif; font-size: 1.125rem; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.625rem; letter-spacing: -0.009rem; }

td { border-bottom: .0625rem solid var(--grey-200); padding: 1.25rem 1rem; font-family: "Basiersquare Webfont", sans-serif; font-size: 0.875rem; line-height: 1.375rem; vertical-align: top; letter-spacing: -0.00175rem; color: var(--Grey-700); }

td:first-child { font-weight: 500; color: var(--Grey-800); }

th:not(:last-child), td:not(:last-child) { border-right: .0625rem solid var(--grey-200); }

      event: "geoDataRetrieved",
      userIP: ip,
      countryCode: countryCode,
      countryTier: countryTier
    });

    // Notify any listeners waiting for geo completion (expected by legacy scripts)
    document.dispatchEvent(new Event("geoDataComplete"));

  if (window.__syn_geo_ready && typeof window.__syn_geo_ready.then === "function") {

  const g2Score = 4.7;

  // Global functions
  function debounce(func, wait, immediate) {
    var timeout;
    return function () {
      var context = this,
          args = arguments;
      var later = function () {
        timeout = null;
        if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
      };
      var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
      clearTimeout(timeout);
      timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
      if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
    };
  }

  function throttle(func, limit) {
    let lastFunc;
    let lastRan;
    return function () {
      const context = this;
      const args = arguments;
      if (!lastRan) {
        func.apply(context, args);
        lastRan = Date.now();
      } else {
        clearTimeout(lastFunc);
        lastFunc = setTimeout(function () {
          if ((Date.now() - lastRan) >= limit) {
            func.apply(context, args);
            lastRan = Date.now();
          }
        }, limit - (Date.now() - lastRan));
      }
    };
  }
</script>

    if (!localeWrapper) return;

    const existingHreflangs = new Set(
      [...localeWrapper.querySelectorAll("a")].map(a => a.getAttribute("hreflang"))
    );

    languageOptions.forEach(({ hreflang }) => {
      const existingItems = localeWrapper.querySelectorAll(`a[hreflang="${hreflang}"]`);

      if (existingItems.length > 1) {
        existingItems.forEach((el, index) => {
          if (index > 0) el.closest(".w-locales-item")?.remove();
        });
      }
    });

    const templateItem = localeWrapper.querySelector(".w-locales-item:last-of-type");
    if (!templateItem) return;

    const localeItems = document.querySelectorAll(`${wrapperSelector} .w-locales-item`);
    if (localeItems.length === 0) return;

    languageOptions.forEach(({ hreflang, href, languageCode, languageName }) => {

      if (existingHreflangs.has(hreflang)) return;

      const newItem = templateItem.cloneNode(true);
      const link = newItem.querySelector("a");
      if (link) {
        link.setAttribute("hreflang", hreflang);
        link.href = href;
        link.classList.remove("w--current");
      }

      const codeDiv = newItem.querySelector("div[lang-code]");
      if (codeDiv) {
        codeDiv.textContent = languageCode;
      }

      const nameDiv = newItem.querySelector("div[lang-name]");
      if (nameDiv) {
        nameDiv.textContent = languageName;
      }

      templateItem.insertAdjacentElement("afterend", newItem);
    });
  }

  const newLanguages = [
    { hreflang: "ja", href: "/ja", languageCode: "ja", languageName: "日本語" },
    { hreflang: "nl", href: "/nl", languageCode: "nl", languageName: "Nederlands" },
    { hreflang: "it", href: "/it", languageCode: "it", languageName: "Italiano" },
    { hreflang: "sv", href: "/sv", languageCode: "sv", languageName: "Svenska" },
  ];

  cloneAndModifyLanguageItem(".navbar_dropdown-locale-list-wrapper", newLanguages);
  cloneAndModifyLanguageItem(".footer_dropdown-locale-list-wrapper", newLanguages);
}

if (!window.hasRunLocaleScript) {
  window.hasRunLocaleScript = true;

  if (document.readyState === "loading") {
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", runLocaleScript);
  } else {
    runLocaleScript();
  }
}
</script>

// Throttle function
function throttle(func, limit) {
    let lastFunc;
    let lastRan;
    return function() {
        const context = this;
        const args = arguments;
        if (!lastRan) {
            func.apply(context, args);
            lastRan = Date.now();
        } else {
            clearTimeout(lastFunc);
            lastFunc = setTimeout(function() {
                if ((Date.now() - lastRan) >= limit) {
                    func.apply(context, args);
                    lastRan = Date.now();
                }
            }, limit - (Date.now() - lastRan));
        }
    };
}

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Add the top-banner-visible class to the body on page load
    // document.body.classList.add('top-banner-visible');

    const topBanner = document.querySelector('.top-banner');
    const closeButton = document.querySelector('.top-banner-close');

    // Function to handle scroll event
    function handleScroll() {
        if (window.scrollY > 500) {
            document.body.classList.remove('top-banner-visible');
        } else {
            document.body.classList.add('top-banner-visible');
        }
    }

    // Throttled scroll event listener
    const throttledScroll = throttle(handleScroll, 100);  // Adjust the limit as needed

    // Add scroll event listener
    window.addEventListener('scroll', throttledScroll);

    // Add an event listener to the close button
    if (closeButton) {
        closeButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
            // Remove the top-banner div
            if (topBanner) {
                topBanner.remove();
            }
            // Remove the top-banner-visible class from <body>
            document.body.classList.remove('top-banner-visible');
            
            // Remove the scroll event listener
            window.removeEventListener('scroll', throttledScroll);
        });
    }
});
</script></div></div><div class="page-wrapper"><div class="page-code"><div class="css"><div class="display-none"><div class="designer-fixes w-embed"></div><div class="styleguidev2-custom-css w-embed">

// -----------------------------
// Global function for custom autscroll play/pause
// -----------------------------
function setupAutoScrollHelpers(autoScroll, delay = 1000) {
  let autoScrollTimer = null;

  function stopAutoScroll() {
    autoScroll.stop();
    if (autoScrollTimer !== null) {
      clearTimeout(autoScrollTimer);
      autoScrollTimer = null;
    }
  }

  function startAutoScroll() {
    if (autoScrollTimer === null) {
      autoScrollTimer = setTimeout(function() {
        autoScroll.play();
        autoScrollTimer = null;
      }, delay);
    }
  }
  
  return { stopAutoScroll, startAutoScroll };
}


// -----------------------------
// Global function to create and navigate w/ dot navigation
// -----------------------------
function setupDotNavigation(sliderElement, emblaApi) {
  // Look for the dots container within the slider element.
  const dotsContainer = sliderElement.querySelector(".embla__dots");
  if (!dotsContainer) return; // Exit if no container found.

  // Clear any existing content in the dots container.
  dotsContainer.innerHTML = "";

  // Get the slide nodes from Embla.
  const slideNodes = emblaApi.slideNodes();

  // Create a dot button for each slide.
  slideNodes.forEach((_, index) => {
    const dot = document.createElement("button");
    dot.className = "embla__dot";
    dot.setAttribute("type", "button");
    dot.addEventListener("click", () => emblaApi.scrollTo(index));
    dotsContainer.appendChild(dot);
  });

  // Convert the dot buttons into an array for easier handling.
  const dotNodes = Array.from(dotsContainer.children);

  // Define a function that updates the "active" state.
  function setDotState() {
    const selectedIndex = emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap();
    dotNodes.forEach((dot, index) => {
      dot.classList.toggle("is-active", index === selectedIndex);
    });
  }

  // Update the active state when the slide changes.
  emblaApi.on("select", setDotState);
  // Set the initial active dot.
  setDotState();
}
</script></div><div class="w-embed"></div></div><div class="html-video-playback w-embed w-script"><script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {

  // Only swap/play/pause videos that are actually rendered
  function isVisible(video) {
    return video.offsetParent !== null;
  }
	
	// Funciton to update the [src] with the value from [switch-src]
  function swapVideoSources(video) {
    let didSwap = false;
    video.querySelectorAll('source').forEach(srcEl => {
      if (!srcEl.hasAttribute('src')) return;     // Skip if video has no src yet (not loaded)
      const altUrl = srcEl.getAttribute('switch-src');
      if (altUrl) {
        srcEl.setAttribute('src', altUrl);
        srcEl.removeAttribute('switch-src'); // Remove [switch-src] once switched
        didSwap = true;
      }
    });
    if (didSwap) video.load();
  }

	// Play video function
  function playVideo(video, button) {
    swapVideoSources(video);
    button.setAttribute('active', 'true');
    video.muted       = false;
    video.loop        = false;
    video.currentTime = 0;
    video.play().catch(err => console.warn('Playback prevented:', err));
  }
	
	// Pause video function
  function pauseVideo(video, button) {
    button.setAttribute('active', 'false');
    video.muted = true;
    video.loop  = true;
  }
	
	// video ended function
  function videoEnded(video, button) {
    button.setAttribute('active', 'false');
    video.muted       = true;
    video.loop        = true;
    video.currentTime = 0;
    video.play();
  }


  // call pauseVideo when scrolled out of view
  const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
    entries.forEach(entry => {
      if (!entry.isIntersecting) {
        const videoContainer = entry.target;
        const button    = videoContainer.querySelector('.video-button');
        const visibleVideo = Array.from(videoContainer.querySelectorAll('video'))
                                  .find(isVisible);
        if (visibleVideo && button) {
          pauseVideo(visibleVideo, button);
        }
      }
    });
  }, { threshold: 0 });


  // Wire up each videoContainer
  document.querySelectorAll('[video-container]').forEach(videoContainer => {
    const trigger = videoContainer.querySelector('.expand-trigger');
    const button  = videoContainer.querySelector('.video-button');
    const allVideos = Array.from(videoContainer.querySelectorAll('video'));
    if (!trigger || !button || allVideos.length === 0) return;

    
    trigger.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const vid = allVideos.find(isVisible); // Click only affects visible video
      if (!vid) return;
      if (vid.muted) {
        playVideo(vid, button);
      } else {
        pauseVideo(vid, button);
      }
    });

    // Call videoEnded when video ends
		allVideos.forEach(video => {
		  video.addEventListener('ended', function() {
		    videoEnded(this, button);
		  });
		});

    // Start observing this videoContainer
    observer.observe(videoContainer);
  });
});
</script></div><div class="w-embed w-script"><script type="module">
window.SYN = window.SYN || {};
SYN.debug = true;

const cssanim = () => {
    const styleEl = document.createElement('style');
    styleEl.textContent = `
        .pause-anim,
        .pause-anim:before,
        .pause-anim::before {
            animation-play-state: paused !important;
        }
    `;
    document.head.append(styleEl);

    window.SYN_CSSANIMS = window.SYN_CSSANIMS || [];

    function findAnimatedEls(root = document) {
        return [...root.querySelectorAll('*')].filter(el => {
            if (el.classList.contains('logo-row-img-container-inner')) return false;
            
            const own = getComputedStyle(el);
            const before = getComputedStyle(el, '::before');
            const after = getComputedStyle(el, '::after');

            return [own, before, after].some(cs =>
                cs.animationName !== 'none' && parseFloat(cs.animationDuration) > 0
            );
        });
    }

    window.SYN_CSSANIMS = [...findAnimatedEls()];
    SYN.log(`window.SYN_CSSANIMS: ${window.SYN_CSSANIMS}`);

    const rootMargin = '10px 0px';

    const cssAnimObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
        entries.forEach(obj => {
            const el = obj.target;
            if (obj.isIntersecting) {
                el.classList.remove("pause-anim");
                SYN.log(`CSS resume: ${el.id}`);
            } else {
                el.classList.add("pause-anim");
                SYN.log(`CSS pause: ${el.id}`);
            }
        });
    }, { rootMargin });

    window.SYN_CSSANIMS.forEach(function (el) {
        cssAnimObserver.observe(el);
    });
};

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", cssanim);
</script></div><div class="w-embed w-script"><script type="module">
window.SYN = window.SYN || {};
SYN.debug = true;

const emblaMan = () => {
    window.SYNEMS = window.SYNEMS || new WeakMap();

    const emblaSliders = [
        document.querySelector("#emblaHeroVideo"),
        document.querySelector("#emblaTestimonialsV2")
    ];
    const rootMargin = '10px 0px';

    const streamingVideoObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
        entries.forEach(obj => {
            const sl = obj.target;
            const emblaApi = window.SYNEMS.get(sl);
            if (obj.isIntersecting) {
                emblaApi.reInit({ active: true });
                SYN.log(`activating: ${sl.id}`);

                if (sl.id === "emblaHeroVideo") {
                    emblaApi.scrollTo(0);
                    SYN.log(`Hero -> 0`);
                }
            } else {
                SYN.log(`deactivating: ${sl.id}`);
                if (sl.id === "emblaHeroVideo") {
                    window.muteSequence();
                    document.querySelector(".video-button_inner").parentNode.setAttribute("active", false);
                    emblaApi.scrollTo(3);
                }
                if (sl.id === "emblaTestimonialsV2") {
                    const slides = emblaApi.slideNodes();
	
                    slides.forEach(slide => {
                        const video = slide.querySelector("video");
                        const videoButton = slide.querySelector(".video-button");

                        slide.classList.remove("is-playing");
                        videoButton.setAttribute('active', 'false');
                    });
                }
                emblaApi.reInit({ active: false });
            }
        });
    }, {rootMargin});

    emblaSliders.forEach(function (sl) {
        streamingVideoObserver.observe(sl);
    });
};

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", emblaMan);

</script></div><div class="w-embed w-script"><script type="module">
window.SYN = window.SYN || {};
SYN.debug = true;

const streamingMan = async () => {
    function waitForDashJS() {
        return new Promise(resolve => {
            if (window.dashjs) return resolve();
            const iv = setInterval(() => { if (window.dashjs) { clearInterval(iv); resolve(); } }, 50);
        });
    }

    let v = document.createElement('video');
    window.canHLS = !!v.canPlayType && (
        v.canPlayType('application/vnd.apple.mpegurl') ||
        v.canPlayType('application/x-mpegURL')
    ).replace(/no/, '');
    v = null;
    if (!window.canHLS) {
        const s = document.createElement('script');
        //s.src = 'https://cdn.dashjs.org/v5.0.3/dash.mediaplayer.min.js';
        s.src = 'https://webcdn.synthesia.io/wfjs/dashjs/v5.0.3/dash.mediaplayer.min.js';
        s.defer = true;
        document.head.append(s);
    }

    let dashMpByEl = null;
    if (!window.canHLS) {
        await waitForDashJS();
        dashMpByEl = new WeakMap();
    }

    const streamingVideos = [...document.querySelectorAll("video[streaming]")];
    const rootMargin = '0px 0px';

    const stopAllVids = butVid => {
        streamingVideos.forEach(vid => {
            if (vid !== butVid) {
                try {
                    vid.pause();
                } catch (err) {
                    SYN.log(`err: ${err}`);
                }
            }
        });
    };

    document.addEventListener("click", e => {
        const vid = e.target.parentElement.querySelector('video[streaming]');
        if (!vid) return;
        stopAllVids(vid);
    });

    const loadVid = async vid => {
        const streamurlsplit = vid.dataset.streamurl.split("/");
        const streamname = streamurlsplit[streamurlsplit.length - 1].split(".")[0];
        const streampath = `https://webcdn.synthesia.io/streams/${streamname}`;

        if (window.canHLS) {
            vid.src = `${streampath}/stream.m3u8`;
            vid.load();
        } else {
            if (dashMpByEl && dashMpByEl.has(vid)) return;
            let mp = dashjs.MediaPlayer().create();
            mp.updateSettings({
                streaming: {
                    gaps: {
                        jumpGaps: true,
                        jumpLargeGaps: false,
                        smallGapLimit: 2,
                        enableSeekFix:   false,
                        enableStallFix:  false,
                        threshold:       0.5
                    }
                }
            });
            const endedCall = () => {
                if (vid.duration - vid.currentTime <= 0.5 && !mp.isDynamic()) {
                    SYN.log(`DASH | PLAYBACK_ENDED.`);
                    vid._endedCall();
                } else {
                    console.debug('-.');
                }
            };
            mp.on(
                dashjs.MediaPlayer.events.PLAYBACK_ENDED,
                endedCall,
                { once: true }
            );
            dashMpByEl.set(vid, mp);
            mp.initialize(vid, `${streampath}/stream.mpd`, false);
        }

        const poster = vid.dataset.poster;
        if (poster) {
            vid.poster = poster;
        }

        if (vid.getAttribute("autoplay")) {
            try {
                await vid.play();
                SYN.log("autoplay.");
            } catch (err) {
                SYN.log(err);
            }
        }
    };

    const unloadVid = vid => {
        vid.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode.classList.remove("is-playing");

        if (window.canHLS) {
            // if (vid._endedCall) {
            //     SYN.log(`HLS | unloadVid, removing _endedCall.`);
            //     vid.removeEventListener("ended", vid._endedCall);
            // }
            vid.pause();
            vid.removeAttribute('src');
            vid.load();
            SYN.log(`HLS | unloaded ${vid}`);
            return;
        }

        if (!dashMpByEl || !dashMpByEl.has(vid)) return;
        const mp = dashMpByEl.get(vid);
        dashMpByEl.delete(vid);
        mp.attachSource(null);
        mp.attachView(null);
        const done = () => {
            mp.destroy();
        };
        mp.on(dashjs.MediaPlayer.events.STREAM_TEARDOWN_COMPLETE, done);
        mp.reset(false);
        SYN.log(`DASH | unloaded: ${vid.dataset.streamurl}`);
    };

    const streamingVideoObserver = new IntersectionObserver((entries, observer) => {
        entries.forEach(el => {
            const vid = el.target;
            if (el.isIntersecting) {
                loadVid(vid);
            } else {
                unloadVid(vid);
            }
        });
    }, { rootMargin });

    streamingVideos.forEach(function (vid) {
        streamingVideoObserver.observe(vid);
    });
};

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", streamingMan);
</script></div></div></div><nav id="nav" variant="light" scrolled="false" class="navbar" style=""><div class="navbar-styling w-embed">

<script>
window.addEventListener('load', function() {
  (function() {
    // --------------------------------------
    // 1) Config: use ONLY 2-letter keys everywhere
    // --------------------------------------
    const secondaryLocales = ['fr', 'de', 'es', 'pt']; // 2-letter only
    const onePagers = ['sv', 'ja', 'it', 'nl'];        // 2-letter only

    // If a locale's site slug differs from the 2-letter code, map it here.
    // e.g., 'pt' site lives under `/pt-br`
    const localeSlug = {
      pt: 'pt-br'
    };

    // One-pager paths
    const onePagerPaths = {
      '/pricing': '#pricing-section',
      '/pricing-options': '#pricing-section',
      // '/create-free-ai-video': '#free-demo-section'
    };

    // 2-letter keyed translations
    const translations = {
      fr: {
        title: 'Voulez-vous consulter ce contenu en <span class="text-highlight-gradient">français</span> ?',
        description: 'Nous avons spécialement préparé une version dans votre langue pour vous.',
        'link-text': 'Afficher en français'
      },
      de: {
        title: 'Willst du diesen Inhalt auf <span class="text-highlight-gradient">Deutsch</span> sehen?',
        description: 'Wir haben extra eine Version in deiner Sprache für dich vorbereitet.',
        'link-text': 'Wechsle zu Deutsch'
      },
      es: {
        title: '¿Quieres ver este contenido en <span class="text-highlight-gradient">español</span>?',
        description: 'Tenemos una versión en tu idioma, solo para ti.',
        'link-text': 'Cambia a español'
      },
      pt: {
        title: 'Quer ver este conteúdo em <span class="text-highlight-gradient">português</span>?',
        description: 'Temos as informações no seu idioma, especialmente para você.',
        'link-text': 'Mudar para o português'
      },
      sv: {
        title: 'Vill du se detta innehåll på <span class="text-highlight-gradient">svenska</span>?',
        description: 'Vi har detaljerna på ditt språk, bara för dig.',
        'link-text': 'Byt till svenska'
      },
      ja: {
        title: 'このコンテンツを<span class="text-highlight-gradient">日本語</span>で表示しますか?',
        description: 'あなたの言語で詳しくご紹介します。',
        'link-text': '日本語に切り替える'
      },
      it: {
        title: 'Vuoi vedere questo contenuto in <span class="text-highlight-gradient">italiano</span>?',
        description: 'Disponiamo delle informazioni in italiano, appositamente per te.',
        'link-text': 'Seleziona italiano'
      },
      nl: {
        title: 'Wil je deze content in het <span class="text-highlight-gradient">Nederlands</span> zien?',
        description: 'We hebben de details in jouw taal, speciaal voor jou.',
        'link-text': 'Overschakelen naar Nederlands'
      }
    };

    // --------------------------------------
    // 3) Skip if UTM indicates "paid" traffic
    // --------------------------------------
    const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
    const utmMedium = searchParams.get('utm_medium') || '';
    const paidMediaValues = ['paid', 'cpc', 'paid_social'];
    if (paidMediaValues.includes(utmMedium.toLowerCase())) return;

    // --------------------------------------
    // 4) Session Storage logic
    // --------------------------------------
    const currentPath = window.location.pathname;
    const popupShownOn = sessionStorage.getItem('popupShownOn') || '';
    if (popupShownOn && popupShownOn !== currentPath) {
      sessionStorage.setItem('localePopupClosed', 'true');
    }
    if (sessionStorage.getItem('localePopupClosed') === 'true') return;

    // --------------------------------------
    // 5) Get browser locale — **first two letters only**
    // --------------------------------------
    function getBrowserLocale2() {
      const raw = (navigator.language || navigator.userLanguage || '').toLowerCase();
      return raw.slice(0, 2); // e.g. 'es' for 'es-ES', 'pt' for 'pt-BR'
    }
    const browserLocale2 = getBrowserLocale2();
    if (!browserLocale2) return;

    // --------------------------------------
    // 6) Decide whether to show popup
    // --------------------------------------
    let mode = null; // 'secondary' | 'onePager'
    if (secondaryLocales.includes(browserLocale2)) {
      mode = 'secondary';
    } else if (onePagers.includes(browserLocale2)) {
      mode = 'onePager';
    } else {
      return; // unsupported locale
    }

    if (mode === 'onePager' && !onePagerPaths[currentPath]) return;

    // --------------------------------------
    // 7) Prepare elements
    // --------------------------------------
    const popupElement = document.querySelector('[locale-popup]');
    if (!popupElement) return;
    const popupLinkElement = popupElement.querySelector('[locale-popup-link]');
    if (!popupLinkElement) return;

    // Helper: resolve slug ('pt' -> 'pt-br', others -> 'xx')
    function slugFor(locale2) {
      return localeSlug[locale2] || locale2;
    }

    // Helper: find <link rel="alternate" hreflang="xx" or "xx-*">
    function getAlternateHrefForLocale2(locale2) {
      const links = document.querySelectorAll('link[rel="alternate"][hreflang][href]');
      const t = (locale2 || '').toLowerCase();

      // Prefer exact 2-letter hreflang="xx"
      for (const link of links) {
        const hl = link.getAttribute('hreflang')?.toLowerCase();
        if (hl === t) return link.getAttribute('href');
      }
      // Accept any xx-YY (e.g., es-ES, pt-BR) when we only care about "es"/"pt"
      for (const link of links) {
        const hl = link.getAttribute('hreflang')?.toLowerCase();
        if (hl && hl.startsWith(t + '-')) return link.getAttribute('href');
      }
      return null;
    }

    // --------------------------------------
    // 8) Build link (abort if not possible for secondary)
    // --------------------------------------
    if (mode === 'onePager') {
      const anchorLink = onePagerPaths[currentPath];
      popupLinkElement.href = `/${slugFor(browserLocale2)}${anchorLink}`;
    } else {
      // Secondary locales: rely on <link rel="alternate"> to avoid wrong paths
      const altHref = getAlternateHrefForLocale2(browserLocale2);
      if (!altHref) return; // don’t show popup if we can’t resolve a safe target
      popupLinkElement.href = altHref;
    }

    // --------------------------------------
    // 9) Inject translations (2-letter keyed)
    // --------------------------------------
    if (translations[browserLocale2]) {
      popupElement.querySelectorAll('[language-popup]').forEach(el => {
        const key = el.getAttribute('language-popup');
        if (translations[browserLocale2][key]) {
          el.innerHTML = translations[browserLocale2][key];
        }
      });
    }

    // --------------------------------------
    // 10) Show the popup + close handling
    // --------------------------------------
    window.dataLayer?.push?.({ event: 'localePopupShown' });
    popupElement.classList.add('show');
    sessionStorage.setItem('popupShownOn', currentPath);

    document.querySelectorAll('[locale-popup-close]').forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
        popupElement.classList.remove('show');
        sessionStorage.setItem('localePopupClosed', 'true');
      });
    });
  })();
});
</script>

    window.dataLayer.push({event: 'localePopupShown'});

    popupElement.classList.add('show');
    sessionStorage.setItem('popupShownOn', currentPath);

    // 9) Close button logic
    const closeBtns = document.querySelectorAll('[locale-popup-close]');
    if (closeBtns) {
      closeBtns.forEach(btn => {
        btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
          popupElement.classList.remove('show');
          sessionStorage.setItem('localePopupClosed', 'true');
        });
      });
    }
  })();
  
});
</script>

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
  const NAVBAR_HIDE_SCROLL_DELTA = 40; // Scroll delta to hide navbar
  const NAVBAR_SHOW_SCROLL_DELTA = -20; // Scroll delta to show navbar
  const VARIANT_CHANGE_SCROLL_THRESHOLD = 80; // Scroll threshold for changing the navbar variant
  const RESPONSIVE_WIDTH_QUERY = '(max-width: 767px)'; // Media query for responsive behavior
  const THROTTLE_DELAY = 30; // Delay in ms for the throttle function

  const navbar = document.getElementById('nav'); // Select navbar
  const stickySections = document.querySelectorAll('[data-sticky-section]'); // Select sticky sections
  const originalVariant = navbar.getAttribute('variant'); // Store the original value
  let lastScrollPosition = 0; // Track of the last scroll position
  let cumulativeScrollDelta = 0; // Track cumulative scroll distance
  let isAnchorLink = window.location.hash; // Check if URL contains an anchor link
  let initialLoad = true; // Flag to track initial load

  // Function to check and update the navbar variant on load
  function checkAndUpdateNavbarVariantOnLoad() {
    let initialScrollPosition = window.scrollY || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
    if (initialScrollPosition > VARIANT_CHANGE_SCROLL_THRESHOLD) {
      navbar.setAttribute('variant', 'null');
      navbar.setAttribute('scrolled', 'true');  // Set 'scrolled' to true when navbar variant changes to null
    } else {
      navbar.setAttribute('variant', originalVariant);
      navbar.setAttribute('scrolled', 'false');  // Set 'scrolled' to false when variant is reset
    }
  }

  // Function to update sticky sections based on navbar visibility
  function updateStickySections(hidden) {
    stickySections.forEach(section => {
      if (hidden) {
        section.classList.add('navbar-hidden-sticky');
      } else {
        section.classList.remove('navbar-hidden-sticky');
      }
    });
  }

  // Function to handle scroll events
  function handleScroll() {
    let currentScrollPosition = window.scrollY || document.documentElement.scrollTop;
    let scrollDelta = currentScrollPosition - lastScrollPosition;

    if ((cumulativeScrollDelta > 0 && scrollDelta < 0) || (cumulativeScrollDelta < 0 && scrollDelta > 0)) {
      cumulativeScrollDelta = scrollDelta;
    } else {
      cumulativeScrollDelta += scrollDelta;
    }

    // Apply style changes only if screen width is below threshold
    if (window.matchMedia(RESPONSIVE_WIDTH_QUERY).matches) {
      if (!initialLoad || !isAnchorLink) {
        applyNavbarStyleChanges();
      }
    }

    // After first scroll, set initialLoad to false
    initialLoad = false;

    // Update the last scroll position
    lastScrollPosition = currentScrollPosition;

    // Check scroll position for variant attribute change
    if (currentScrollPosition > VARIANT_CHANGE_SCROLL_THRESHOLD) {
      navbar.setAttribute('variant', 'null');
      navbar.setAttribute('scrolled', 'true');  // Set 'scrolled' to true when navbar variant changes to null
    } else {
      navbar.setAttribute('variant', originalVariant);
      navbar.setAttribute('scrolled', 'false');  // Set 'scrolled' to false when variant is reset
    }
  }

  // Function to apply style changes to the navbar
  function applyNavbarStyleChanges() {
    if (cumulativeScrollDelta > NAVBAR_HIDE_SCROLL_DELTA && window.scrollY > 50) {
      navbar.classList.add('navbar-hidden'); // Update navbar position
      updateStickySections(true); // Update sticky position
      cumulativeScrollDelta = 0; // Reset cumulative scroll
    } else if (cumulativeScrollDelta < NAVBAR_SHOW_SCROLL_DELTA) {
      navbar.classList.remove('navbar-hidden'); // Update navbar position
      updateStickySections(false); // Update sticky position
      cumulativeScrollDelta = 0; // Reset cumulative scroll
    }
  }

  // Throttle function to limit the rate of function execution
  function throttle(func, limit) {
    let lastFunc;
    let lastRan;
    return function () {
      const context = this;
      const args = arguments;
      if (!lastRan) {
        func.apply(context, args);
        lastRan = Date.now();
      } else {
        clearTimeout(lastFunc);
        lastFunc = setTimeout(function () {
          if ((Date.now() - lastRan) >= limit) {
            func.apply(context, args);
            lastRan = Date.now();
          }
        }, limit - (Date.now() - lastRan));
      }
    };
  }

  // Call function to check and update navbar variant on initial load
  checkAndUpdateNavbarVariantOnLoad();

  // Add scroll event listener with throttled handler
  window.addEventListener('scroll', throttle(handleScroll, THROTTLE_DELAY));
});


/* START - NO SCROLL WHEN MOBILE MENU IS OPEN + COMBO CLASS FOR TRANSPARENT STYLING */
// Set overflow:hidden on body when clicking burger menu
document.querySelector('.navbar_burger-icon-wrapper').addEventListener('click', function () {
  var element = this;
  var clicks = element.getAttribute('data-clicks') === 'true'; // because data attributes return as string

  if (clicks) {
    document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
    document.querySelector('#nav').classList.remove('is-open')
  } else {
    document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
    document.querySelector('#nav').classList.add('is-open')
  }

  element.setAttribute('data-clicks', !clicks);
});

// Enable scroll on anchor link click
navLinkItems = document.querySelectorAll('.navbar a');

for (let navLink of navLinkItems) {
  navLink.addEventListener('click', function () {
    document.querySelector('body').style.overflow = 'auto';
    document.querySelector('#nav').classList.remove('is-open');
  });
}
/* END - NO SCROLL WHEN MOBILE MENU IS OPEN + COMBO CLASS FOR TRANSPARENT STYLING */


/* START - NAVLINK BOLD ON HOVER */
// Automatically assign an attribute to each navbar link with same value as the link-text
let navTopLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.navbar_dropdown-toggle .paragraph-medium')
for (let topLink of navTopLinks) {
  topLink.setAttribute('title', `${topLink.innerText}`)
}
/* END - NAVLINK BOLD ON HOVER */



/*START - Show background when dropdown menu is open */
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  // Select the navbar menu items wrapper
  const menuWrapper = document.querySelector('.navbar_menu-items-wrapper');

  // Select all dropdowns within the menu wrapper
  const dropdownWrappers = menuWrapper.querySelectorAll('.w-dropdown');
  const overlay = menuWrapper.querySelector('.navbar_bg-overlay');

  // Function to check if any dropdown is open by checking the child elements
  function checkDropdownState() {
    let anyOpen = false;
    dropdownWrappers.forEach(wrapper => {
      const dropdownChild = wrapper.querySelector('.w-dropdown-toggle'); // Assuming the child has this class
      if (dropdownChild && dropdownChild.classList.contains('w--open')) {
        anyOpen = true;
      }
    });

    // Toggle the .is-visible class on the overlay
    if (anyOpen) {
      overlay.classList.add('is-visible');
    } else {
      overlay.classList.remove('is-visible');
    }
  }

  // Set up MutationObserver configuration
  const observerConfig = { attributes: true, attributeFilter: ['class'] };

  // Function to handle mutations
  const mutationCallback = (mutationsList) => {
    for (let mutation of mutationsList) {
      if (mutation.type === 'attributes' && mutation.attributeName === 'class') {
        checkDropdownState();
      }
    }
  };

  // Create a new MutationObserver instance
  const observer = new MutationObserver(mutationCallback);

  // Observe the child of each dropdown element for changes in its class within the menu wrapper
  dropdownWrappers.forEach(wrapper => {
    const dropdownChild = wrapper.querySelector('.w-dropdown-list'); // Assuming the child has this class
    if (dropdownChild) {
      observer.observe(dropdownChild, observerConfig);
    }
  });

  // Initial check for already open dropdowns on page load
  checkDropdownState();
  /*END - Show background when dropdown menu is open */

  /*START - Hide/show dropdown content based on tabs*/
  // Function to initialize tab switching for a specific dropdown
  function initializeDropdownTabs(dropdown) {
    // Find all tab links within the dropdown
    const tabs = dropdown.querySelectorAll('[dd-feature-tab], [dd-template-tab], [dd-team-tab], [dd-use-case-tab], [dd-industry-tab]');
    // Find all elements associated with tabs within the dropdown
    const contents = dropdown.querySelectorAll('[dd-feature], [dd-template], [dd-team], [dd-use-case], [dd-industry]');

    // Add event listeners to all tab links
    tabs.forEach(tab => {
      // Uncomment the next line and comment the click listener for hover behavior
      // tab.addEventListener('mouseenter', function () { // Trigger on hover
      tab.addEventListener('click', function () { // Trigger on click
        const tabAttr = [...tab.attributes].find(attr => attr.name.startsWith('dd-')).name; // Get the attribute name
        const targetAttr = tabAttr.replace('-tab', ''); // Get the corresponding content attribute

        // Reset all tabs and contents in this specific dropdown
        tabs.forEach(t => {
          const tAttr = [...t.attributes].find(attr => attr.name.startsWith('dd-')).name;
          t.setAttribute(tAttr, t.getAttribute(tAttr).replace('active', '').trim());
        });
        contents.forEach(c => {
          const cAttr = [...c.attributes].find(attr => attr.name.startsWith('dd-')).name;
          c.setAttribute(cAttr, c.getAttribute(cAttr).replace('active', '').trim());
        });

        // Activate the clicked tab and all associated content within this dropdown
        tab.setAttribute(tabAttr, 'active');
        const targetContents = dropdown.querySelectorAll(`[${targetAttr}]`); // Select all elements with the same content attribute within this dropdown
        targetContents.forEach(content => {
          content.setAttribute(targetAttr, 'active');
        });
      });
    });
  }

  // Find all dropdowns and initialize their tab functionality
  const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.navbar_dropdown-wrapper');
  dropdowns.forEach(initializeDropdownTabs);
  /*END - Hide/show dropdown content based on tabs*/


	/* Update navigation Log in button href value for logged in users */
  const LogInButton = document.getElementById("log-in");
  if (!LogInButton) return;

  // redirect logged in users 
  const loggedInHref = "https://app.synthesia.io/#/?videosType=MyRecentVideos&marketingDirectLogin=true";
  // check if the cookie exists
  const hasSessionCookie = () => document.cookie.split("; ").some(c => c.startsWith("synthesia-session-hint="));

  // update Log in button href value if cookie exists
  if (hasSessionCookie()) {
    LogInButton.href = loggedInHref;
  }

});
</script></div></nav><main class="main-wrapper is-grid"><header id="w-node-aec9a5fd-3f3b-fff8-9047-e2d007a2a264-64c0d712" class="position-relative"><div class="background-image-container background-gradient-indigo200-white"><img loading="eager" src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e89895c5a4b8d764c0d710/67ea9f12e8a6aa7e90577688_home-new-hero-bg.svg" alt="" class="background-cover-image hide-tablet"></div><div class="transparent-navbar_spacer"></div><div class="page-padding"><div class="container-large z-1"><div id="w-node-aec9a5fd-3f3b-fff8-9047-e2d007a2a26a-64c0d712" class="container-small"><div class="spacer-large"></div><div id="w-node-aec9a5fd-3f3b-fff8-9047-e2d007a2a26c-64c0d712" class="text-align-center"><div class="flex-center-center"><div class="tooltip-target"><div color="custom-hero" is-round="true" class="caption tooltip-target"><div class="margin-left margin-tiny hide-mobile-landscape"></div><div class="caption-medium">#1 ai video platform for business</div><div class="icon-16 w-embed"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" aria-hidden="true" role="img">

width: 8.64583rem;"><div class="embla-dot-highlight-bg" style="transition: max-width 19541ms linear; max-width: 100%;"></div></div></div></div></div><div class="embla-script w-embed w-script"><script type="module">
window.SYN = window.SYN || {};
SYN.debug = true;

document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const heroVideo = document.querySelector("#emblaHeroVideo");
    const heroSection = document.querySelector("[home-hero-visual-container]");

    // -----------------------------
    // Set up slider
    // -----------------------------
    const emblaOptions = {
        loop: true,
        startIndex: 0,
        align: 'center',
        duration: 25,      // duration of slide change, default: 25
        watchDrag: false,  // disable dragging
        // click: false,
    };

    // Create plugins – using fade in this example
    const fade = EmblaCarouselFade();
    const emblaApi = EmblaCarousel(heroVideo, emblaOptions, [fade]);

    window.SYNEMS = window.SYNEMS || new WeakMap();
    window.SYNEMS.set(heroVideo, emblaApi);

    // -----------------------------
    // Dot Navigation Logic
    // -----------------------------
    const dotsWrapper = heroVideo.querySelector(".embla__dots-wrapper");
    const dotsContainer = dotsWrapper.querySelector(".embla__dots");

    if (dotsContainer) {
        // Select the highlight element
        const highlight = dotsContainer.querySelector(".embla-dot-highlight");
        // Convert dots (excluding highlight) to array
        const dotNodes = Array.from(dotsContainer.children).filter(
            child => !child.classList.contains("embla-dot-highlight")
        );

        // Attach click listeners to each dot
        dotNodes.forEach((dot, index) => {
            dot.addEventListener("click", () => emblaApi.scrollTo(index));
        });

        let hasSetActiveClass = false;

        // Update active state and highlight position
        function setDotState() {
            const selectedIndex = emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap();
            dotNodes.forEach((dot, index) => {
                dot.classList.toggle("is-active", index === selectedIndex);
            });

            // Snippet to add class once active dot class been assigned
            // for dots styling before slider has started
            if (!hasSetActiveClass) {
                const activeDotExists = dotNodes.some(dot =>
                    dot.classList.contains("is-active")
                );
                if (activeDotExists) {
                    heroVideo.classList.add("has-active-dot");
                    hasSetActiveClass = true;
                }
            }

            const activeDot = dotNodes[selectedIndex];
            if (activeDot && highlight) {
                const rootFontSize = parseFloat(
                    getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).fontSize
                ) || 16;
                const leftRem = activeDot.offsetLeft / rootFontSize;
                const widthRem = activeDot.offsetWidth / rootFontSize;
                highlight.style.left = `${leftRem}rem`;
                highlight.style.width = `${widthRem}rem`;
            }

            // On mobile, center active dot
            if (window.innerWidth < 767 && activeDot) {
                const centerOffset =
                    activeDot.offsetLeft -
                    dotsWrapper.offsetWidth / 2 +
                    activeDot.offsetWidth / 2;
                dotsWrapper.scrollTo({ left: centerOffset, behavior: 'smooth' });
            }
        }

        // Throttle helper for resize/orientation
        function throttle(func, limit) {
            let inThrottle;
            return function (...args) {
                if (!inThrottle) {
                    func.apply(this, args);
                    inThrottle = true;
                    setTimeout(() => (inThrottle = false), limit);
                }
            };
        }

        window.addEventListener("resize", throttle(setDotState, 200));
        window.addEventListener(
            "orientationchange",
            () => requestAnimationFrame(throttle(setDotState, 200))
        );

        emblaApi.on("select", setDotState);
        setTimeout(setDotState, 500);
    }

    // -----------------------------
    // Active Slide Video Handling
    // -----------------------------
    function playVideoFromStart(videoEl) {
        videoEl.pause();
        videoEl.currentTime = 0;

        const start = () => videoEl.play().catch(err => console.warn("err:", err));
        if (videoEl.readyState >= videoEl.HAVE_FUTURE_DATA) {
            start();
        } else {
            videoEl.addEventListener("canplay", start, { once: true });
        }
    }

    function animateProgressBar(videoEl) {
        const bar = document.querySelector(".embla-dot-highlight-bg");
        if (!bar || !videoEl.duration) return;

        const durationMs = videoEl.duration * 1000;
        bar.style.transition = "none";
        bar.style.maxWidth = "0%";
        bar.getBoundingClientRect(); // Force reflow

        requestAnimationFrame(() => {
            bar.style.transition = `max-width ${durationMs}ms linear`;
            bar.style.maxWidth = "100%";
        });
    }

    // ──────────────────────────────────────────────
    // Reset the video and kick off the progress-bar animation.
    // ──────────────────────────────────────────────
    function resetAndPlay(videoEl) {
        if (videoEl._pbHandler) {
            videoEl.removeEventListener("play", videoEl._pbHandler);
        }
        const handler = () => animateProgressBar(videoEl);
        videoEl._pbHandler = handler;
        videoEl.addEventListener("play", handler, { once: true });
        playVideoFromStart(videoEl);
    }

    // ──────────────────────────────────────────────
    // Update active video on slide change
    // ──────────────────────────────────────────────
    function updateActiveVideo() {
        const activeIdx = emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap();
        emblaApi.slideNodes().forEach((slide, idx) => {
            const vid = slide.querySelector("video");
            if (!vid) return;
            if (idx === activeIdx) resetAndPlay(vid);
            else {
                // vid.pause();
            }
        });
    }

    emblaApi.on("select", updateActiveVideo);
    updateActiveVideo();

    // -----------------------------
    // Advance slide when video finishes
    // -----------------------------
    const totalSlides = emblaApi.slideNodes().length;
    emblaApi.slideNodes().forEach((slide, idx) => {
        const video = slide.querySelector("video");
        if (!video) return;
        
        SYN.log(`Setting _endedCall.`);
        
        const endedCall = e => {
            video.removeEventListener("ended", endedCall);
            const streamurlsplit = video.dataset.streamurl.split("/");
            const streamname = streamurlsplit[streamurlsplit.length - 1].split(".")[0];
            SYN.log(`Vid ended, endedCall(): ${streamname}`);

            const currentIndex = emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap();
            if (idx !== currentIndex) {
                return;
            }
            if (!emblaApi.canScrollNext()) return;

            emblaApi.scrollNext();
            if (currentIndex === totalSlides - 1) muteSequence();
        }

        video._endedCall = endedCall;

        SYN.log(`window.canHLS: ${window.canHLS}`);
        if (window.canHLS) {
            SYN.log(`HLS | adding "ended".`);
            video.addEventListener("ended", endedCall);
        }
    });

    // -----------------------------
    // Set Active Slide Class
    // -----------------------------
    function setActiveSlide() {
        emblaApi.slideNodes().forEach((slide, index) => {
            slide.classList.toggle(
                "is-active",
                index === emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap()
            );
        });
    }
    emblaApi.on("select", setActiveSlide);
    setActiveSlide();

    // -----------------------------
    // Pause/Restart Video on Section Visibility
    // -----------------------------
    function pauseActiveVideo() {
        const idx = emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap();
        const slide = emblaApi.slideNodes()[idx];
        const vid = slide?.querySelector("video");
        if (vid) vid.pause();
    }
    
    // -----------------------------
    // Mute/Unmute Helper Functions
    // -----------------------------
    function unmuteSequence() {
        heroSection.querySelectorAll("video").forEach(v => (v.muted = false));
        const activeSlide = emblaApi.slideNodes()[emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap()];
        const activeVid = activeSlide.querySelector("video");

        if (activeVid) {
            resetAndPlay(activeVid);
        }

        const btn = heroSection.querySelector(".video-button");
        if (btn) btn.setAttribute("active", "true");
    }

    function muteSequence() {
        heroSection.querySelectorAll("video").forEach(v => (v.muted = true));
        const btn = heroSection.querySelector(".video-button");
        if (btn) btn.setAttribute("active", "false");
    }

    window.muteSequence = muteSequence;

    // -----------------------------
    // Attach expand-trigger and slideContainer click listeners
    // -----------------------------
    const expandTrigger = heroSection.querySelector(".expand-trigger");
    const slideContainer = heroSection.querySelector(".embla__container");

    function toggleMuteState(e) {
        const activeSlide = emblaApi.slideNodes()[emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap()];
        const activeVid = activeSlide.querySelector("video");
        if (!activeVid) return;
        activeVid.muted ? unmuteSequence() : muteSequence();
    }

    if (expandTrigger) expandTrigger.addEventListener("click", toggleMuteState);
    if (slideContainer) {
        slideContainer.addEventListener("click", toggleMuteState);
        slideContainer.addEventListener("mouseenter", () => {
            const btn = heroSection.querySelector(".video-button");
            if (btn) btn.classList.add("is-hover");
        });
        slideContainer.addEventListener("mouseleave", () => {
            const btn = heroSection.querySelector(".video-button");
            if (btn) btn.classList.remove("is-hover");
        });
    }


}); //DomContentEnd
</script></div></div><div class="expand-trigger is-home-hero"><div button-size="" active="false" white="false" class="video-button"><div class="video-button_inner"><img src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e89895c5a4b8d764c0d710/65f8660788afd733e97e8ab2_Unmuted-white.svg" loading="lazy" alt="" class="icon-16 video-button_pause"></div><div document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
  const emblaLogoCarousel = document.querySelector("#emblaLogoCarousel");

  // Core options
  const emblaOptions = {
    active: false,
    breakpoints: {
      "(max-width: 700px)": {
        loop: true,
        active: true,
        watchDrag: true,
        dragFree: true,
      },
    },
  };

  // Autoscroll options
  const autoScrollOptions = {
    breakpoints: {
      "(max-width: 700px)": {
        speed: 0.5,
        stopOnMouseEnter: false,
        stopOnFocusIn: false,
        stopOnInteraction: false,
      },
    },
  };

  // Create plugins
  const autoScroll = EmblaCarouselAutoScroll(autoScrollOptions);
  const wheelGestures = EmblaCarouselWheelGestures();

  // Create carousel
  const emblaApi = EmblaCarousel(emblaLogoCarousel, emblaOptions, [autoScroll, wheelGestures]);

  // Get the global AutoScroll functions
  const { stopAutoScroll, startAutoScroll } = setupAutoScrollHelpers(autoScroll);

  // Pause/resume Autoscroll when hovering slider container
  emblaLogoCarousel.addEventListener("mouseenter", stopAutoScroll);
  emblaLogoCarousel.addEventListener("mouseleave", startAutoScroll);


  // position tooltips on smaller devices so they're not cropped off
  (function fixTooltips() {
  
  	// tooltip position 
    const MARGIN = 15;
    const targets = document.querySelectorAll(".tooltip-target");

    targets.forEach((target) => {
      const tooltip = target.querySelector(".synthesia-tooltip");

      target.addEventListener("mouseenter", () => {
        requestAnimationFrame(() => reposition(tooltip));
      });
			
      target.addEventListener("mouseleave", () => {
        tooltip.style.transform = "";
      });
    });

    window.addEventListener("resize", () => {
      targets.forEach((target) => {
        const tooltip = target.querySelector(".synthesia-tooltip");
        const isVisible = window.getComputedStyle(tooltip).display !== "none";
        if (isVisible) reposition(tooltip);
      });
    });

		// clientWidth excludes the scrollbar
    // innerWidth includes the scrollbar
    function getScrollbarWidth() {
      return window.innerWidth - document.documentElement.clientWidth;
    }

    function reposition(tt) {
      tt.style.transform = "translateX(0)";

      const { left, right } = tt.getBoundingClientRect();
      const vw = window.innerWidth;
      const sbw = getScrollbarWidth();   
      const usableRight = vw - sbw;  

      let dx = 0;

      if (left < MARGIN) {
        dx = MARGIN - left;
      } else if (right > usableRight - MARGIN) {
        dx = -(right - (usableRight - MARGIN));
      }

      if (dx) tt.style.transform = `translateX(${dx}px)`;
    }
  })();

});
</script></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></header><section id="w-node-aec9a5fd-3f3b-fff8-9047-e2d007a2a3b4-64c0d712" class="padding-top padding-xxxlarge"><div class="padding-bottom <path d="M1.3335 8H14.6668" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
<path d="M9.2124 2.54541L14.6669 7.99996L9.2124 13.4545" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="1.2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"></path>
</svg></div></div></div><div class="embla-script w-embed w-script"><script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  const testimonialSlider = document.querySelector("#emblaTestimonialsV2");

  // -----------------------------
  // Set up slider
  // -----------------------------
  const emblaOptions = {
    loop: true,
    align: 'center',
		startIndex: 0,
    skipSnaps: true,  // Skip snap if dragged vigorously
/*
    breakpoints: {
			'(min-width: 2000px)': {
				loop: false,
      },
		},
*/
  };

  // Create plugins
  const wheelGestures = EmblaCarouselWheelGestures();
  
  // Create carousel
  const emblaApi = EmblaCarousel(testimonialSlider, emblaOptions, [wheelGestures]);
	
  window.SYNEMS = window.SYNEMS || new WeakMap();
  window.SYNEMS.set(testimonialSlider, emblaApi);
  
  // -----------------------------
  // Navigation (Buttons, Click Events)
  // -----------------------------
  const prevButton = document.querySelector("#prev-slide-testimonials-v2");
  const nextButton = document.querySelector("#next-slide-testimonials-v2");

  prevButton.addEventListener("click", () => {
    emblaApi.scrollPrev();
  });
  nextButton.addEventListener("click", () => {
    emblaApi.scrollNext();
  });
	



	// function to disable buttons when scroll is not possible  
  function updateButtonStates() {
	  if (!emblaApi.canScrollPrev()) {
	    prevButton.classList.add("is-disabled");
	  } else {
	    prevButton.classList.remove("is-disabled");
	  }
	
	  if (!emblaApi.canScrollNext()) {
	    nextButton.classList.add("is-disabled");
	  } else {
	    nextButton.classList.remove("is-disabled");
	  }
	}
	
	// Call funciton when navigating
	emblaApi.on("select", updateButtonStates);
	updateButtonStates();




	// Scroll to clicked slide
  emblaApi.slideNodes().forEach((slide, index) => {
    slide.addEventListener("click", () => {
      emblaApi.scrollTo(index);
    });
  });
  

	function setActiveSlide() {
	  const slideNodes = emblaApi.slideNodes();
	  const selectedIndex = emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap();
	  const numSlides = slideNodes.length;
	
	  
	  slideNodes.forEach(slide => {
	    slide.classList.remove("is-active", "is-active-sibling");
	  });
	
	  // Mark the active slide.
	  slideNodes[selectedIndex].classList.add("is-active");
	
	  // Compute sibling indexes (using modulo for looping behavior).
	  const prevIndex = (selectedIndex - 1 + numSlides) % numSlides;
	  const nextIndex = (selectedIndex + 1) % numSlides;
	
	  // Mark slides before and after the active slide.
	  slideNodes[prevIndex].classList.add("is-active-sibling");
	  slideNodes[nextIndex].classList.add("is-active-sibling");
	}
	
	emblaApi.on("select", setActiveSlide);
	setActiveSlide();





	
	// -----------------------------
	// HTML video playback
	// -----------------------------
	
	const slides = emblaApi.slideNodes();
	
	slides.forEach(slide => {
	  // Get the video element and the .expand-trigger inside this slide.
	  const video = slide.querySelector("video");
	  const expandTrigger = slide.querySelector(".expand-trigger");
	  const videoButton = slide.querySelector(".video-button");
	
	  if (expandTrigger && video && videoButton) {
	    // When the expand trigger is clicked
	    expandTrigger.addEventListener("click", function() {
	      // If the current slide's video is playing, pause it.
	      if (!video.paused) {
	        slide.classList.remove("is-playing");
	        video.pause();
	        video.currentTime = 0;
	        videoButton.setAttribute('active', 'false')
	        return; // Exit early
	      }
	      
	      
	      // Otherwise, pause and reset videos on all other slides.
	      slides.forEach(otherSlide => {
	        const otherVideo = otherSlide.querySelector("video");
	        const otherVideoButton = otherSlide.querySelector(".video-button");
	        if (otherSlide !== slide && otherVideo) {
	          otherSlide.classList.remove("is-playing");
	          otherVideo.pause();
	          otherVideo.currentTime = 0;
	          otherVideoButton.setAttribute('active', 'false')
	        }
	      });
	      
	      // For the current slide, add .is-playing, unmute, reset time and play the video.
	      slide.classList.add("is-playing");
	      video.muted = false;
	      video.currentTime = 0;
	      video.play();
	      videoButton.setAttribute('active', 'true')
	    });
	
	    // When the video ends, remove playing class, pause and reset.
	    video.addEventListener("ended", function() {
	      slide.classList.remove("is-playing");
	      video.pause();
	      video.currentTime = 0;
	      videoButton.setAttribute('active', 'false')
	    });
	
	    // When the video is paused (e.g., by user interaction), also remove playing state and reset.
	    video.addEventListener("pause", function() {
	      if (!video.ended) {
	        slide.classList.remove("is-playing");
	        video.pause();
	        video.currentTime = 0;
	        videoButton.setAttribute('active', 'false')
	      }
	    });
	  }
	});

	
}); // DOMContentLoaded - End
</script></div><div class="page-padding hide-tablet"><div class="container-large z-2"><div class="spacer-xlarge"></div><div class="flex-center-center flex-gap-05rem"><p class="paragraph-medium is-medium">Get custom pricing, a personalized tour, and learn how teams like yours succeed.</p><a id="testimonial-callout-cta" href="https://www.synthesia.io/book-a-demo" class="button-tertiary w-inline-block"><p>Book demo</p><div class="icon-12 w-embed"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="100%" height="100%" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid meet" aria-hidden="true" role="img">

Something went wrong while submitting the form.</div></div></div></div><div class="free-demo-visual-contaiener"><video muted="true" autoplay="true" playsinline="true" class="free-demo-preview" loop="true" poster="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e89895c5a4b8d764c0d710/671793a714d641e25b27d3d5_Alex%20poster.webp"><source data-src="https://webcdn.synthesia.io/free-demo-assets/1080/Alex-personal.mp4" type="video/mp4" src="https://webcdn.synthesia.io/free-demo-assets/1080/Alex-personal.mp4"></video><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e89895c5a4b8d764c0d710/671793a714d641e25b27d3d5_Alex%20poster.webp" alt="" class="free-demo-large-image"><div class="avatar-data-block"><div demo-preview="avatar-name" class="caption-medium">Avatar: Alex</div></div><div class="demo-preview-gradient"></div></div><div class="js hide"><div class="populate-hidden-fields-script w-embed w-script"><script type="application/javascript">
(() => {
  // Make sure script run only once per page
  if (window.__hiddenFormFieldsInitialised) return;
  window.__hiddenFormFieldsInitialised = true;

  let eventID;                      // GTM requirement

    window.addEventListener(
    'load',
    async () => {
      /* ---------- Helpers ---------- */
      const setFieldValues = (selector, value) => {
        const fields = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
        fields.forEach(f => {
          if (value && value !== 'undefined') f.value = value;
        });
      };

      const getCookie = name =>
        document.cookie
          .split(';')
          .reduce((acc, c) => {
            const [n, v] = c.trim().split('=');
            acc[n] = v;
            return acc;
          }, {})[name] || null;

      /* ---------- Value-setting blocks ---------- */
      const setStaticValues = () => {
        eventID = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1e16);
        window.eventID = eventID;
        setFieldValues('input[name="eventid"]', eventID);
        setFieldValues('input[name="user-agent"]', navigator.userAgent);
      };

      const setCookieValues = () => {
        /* 1. Centralised cookie → field mapping  */
        const cookieMap = {
          fbp:        '_fbp',
          fbc:        '_fbc',
          liclid:     'li_fat_id',
          ttqclickid: 'ttclid',
          hsut:       'hubspotutk',
        };
        Object.entries(cookieMap).forEach(([field, cookie]) =>
          setFieldValues(`input[name="${field}"]`, getCookie(cookie))
        );

        /* 2. Cookies that need a transform */
        const uetmsclkid = getCookie('_uetmsclkid');
        if (uetmsclkid && uetmsclkid !== 'undefined') {
          setFieldValues(
            'input[name="msclkid"]',
            uetmsclkid.replace('_uet', '')
          );
        }

        const gaCookie = getCookie('_ga');
        if (gaCookie) {
          const clientId = gaCookie.split('.').slice(2).join('.');
          setFieldValues('input[name="ga_client_id"]', clientId);
        }
      };


			const setGeolocationData = () => {
        // geo.js exposes a readiness promise with the geo payload
        if (!window.__syn_geo_ready || typeof window.__syn_geo_ready.then !== "function") {
          return; // geo.js not loaded for some reason
        }

        window.__syn_geo_ready
          .then((geo) => {
            setFieldValues('input[name="ip_submissions"]',    geo.userIP || "");
            setFieldValues('input[name="ip_country_geojs"]', geo.countryName || "");
          })
          .catch(() => {});
      };
			/*
      const setGeolocationData = () => {
        fetch('https://get.geojs.io/v1/ip/country.json')
          .then(r => r.json())
          .then(g => {
            setFieldValues('input[name="ip_submissions"]',     g.ip);
            setFieldValues('input[name="ip_country_geojs"]',  g.name);
          })
          .catch(() => {});
      };
      */

      const GAgetSessionData = () =>
        new Promise(resolve => {
          const re = /_ga_ETJWNCCEC5=GS\d\.\d\.(.+?)(?:;|$)/;
          const poll = () => {
            const parts = document.cookie.match(re)?.[1].split('.');
            parts
              ? resolve({ ga_session_id: parts[0], ga_session_number: parts[1] })
              : setTimeout(poll, 200);
          };
          poll();
        });

      const setGASessionData = () =>
        GAgetSessionData()
          .then(d =>
            setFieldValues('input[name="ga_session_id"]', d.ga_session_id)
          )
          .catch(() => {});

      const populateUTMField = () =>
        setFieldValues(
          'input[name="recent_form_utm_string"]',
          localStorage.getItem('recent_form_utm_string')
        );

      const setSubmissionPageLanguage = () =>
        setFieldValues(
          'input[name="submission_page_language"]',
          document.documentElement.getAttribute('lang')
        );

      const setProductTrafficField = () => {
        if (location.search.includes('?viaProduct')) {
          setFieldValues('input[name="product_traffic"]', 'true');
        }
      };

      const setQuizSubmittedField = () =>
        setFieldValues(
          'input[name="quizSubmitted"]',
          localStorage.getItem('quizSubmitted') === 'true' ? 'true' : ''
        );

      /* ---------- Master routine (predictable order) ---------- */
      const setHiddenFields = async () => {
        setStaticValues();
        setCookieValues();
        setGeolocationData();          // fire-and-forget
        await setGASessionData();      // ensure GA session ID is ready
        populateUTMField();
        setSubmissionPageLanguage();
        setProductTrafficField();
        setQuizSubmittedField();
      };

      await setHiddenFields();
    },
    { once: true }
  );
})();
</script></div><div class="w-embed w-script"><script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  const freeDemoSlider = document.querySelector("#embla-free-demo");
	
	
  // -----------------------------
  // Set up slider
  // -----------------------------
	
	// Core options
  const emblaOptions = {
    active: false,
		breakpoints: {
			'(max-width: 991px)': {
				active: true,
				// watchDrag: false,
				startIndex: 0, // Start on 1st slide
				align: 'center', // Snap alignment
      },
		},
  };
  
  // Create carousel
  const emblaApi = EmblaCarousel(freeDemoSlider, emblaOptions);


  // -----------------------------
  // Navigation
  // -----------------------------

 	function setActiveSlide() {
	  const slideNodes = emblaApi.slideNodes();
	  const selectedIndex = emblaApi.selectedScrollSnap();
	  slideNodes.forEach((slide, index) => {
	    slide.classList.toggle("is-active", index === selectedIndex);
	  });
	}

	emblaApi.on("select", () => {
	  setActiveSlide(); // update the .is-active classes
	  handleAvatarSliderUpdate(); // trigger the label click update
	});


  // Get the glocal Dot navigation setup
  setupDotNavigation(freeDemoSlider, emblaApi);
  
	// Scroll to clicked slide
	emblaApi.slideNodes().forEach((slide, index) => {
		slide.addEventListener("click", () => {
			emblaApi.scrollTo(index);
		});
	});

  







  
  
  
  
  // Scope the script to the free demo form specifically
  const freeDemoForm = document.querySelector('#freeDemoFormWrapper'); // Select the form container

  if (!freeDemoForm) return; // Exit if this form does not exist

  // Free Demo Form & Inputs within this form
  const inputScript = freeDemoForm.querySelector('[data-name="Video Script"]');
  const inputFirstName = freeDemoForm.querySelector('input[data-name="First Name"]');
  const inputLastName = freeDemoForm.querySelector('input[data-name="Last Name"]');
  const inputUserEmail = freeDemoForm.querySelector('input[data-name="Email"]');


  // DOM Elements within this form
  const charDisclaimer = freeDemoForm.querySelector('[free-demo="char-string"]');
  const nextButton = freeDemoForm.querySelector('[free-demo="next-button"]');
  const backButton = freeDemoForm.querySelector('[free-demo="back"]');
  const formStepContainer = freeDemoForm.querySelector('[free-demo-slider-container]')



  // Preview Strings
  const stringAvatarName = freeDemoForm.querySelector('[demo-preview="avatar-name"]');

  // Utility function for inner text retrieval
  const getInnerText = (selector) => freeDemoForm.querySelector(selector)?.innerText || null;

  // Character counter strings within this form
  const blankMessage = getInnerText('[count-string="blank"]');
  const exceededMessage = getInnerText('[count-string="exceeded"]');
  const fullMessage = getInnerText('[count-string="full"]');
  const leftMessage = getInnerText('[count-string="left"]');

  // Set looping for the demo preview video
  const demoPreviewVideo = freeDemoForm.querySelector('.free-demo-preview');
  if (demoPreviewVideo) {
    demoPreviewVideo.setAttribute('loop', 'true');
    demoPreviewVideo.setAttribute('muted', 'true');
  }

  document.querySelector('textarea[name="Video-Script"]').addEventListener('input', function () {
    const checkedLabelInput = document.querySelector('label[is-checked="true"] input');
    if (checkedLabelInput) {
      checkedLabelInput.setAttribute('user-script', document.querySelector('textarea[name="Video-Script"]').value);
    }
  });


  // Event Handlers for inputs and actions within this form
  const radioButtons = freeDemoForm.querySelectorAll('input[type="radio"]');

  radioButtons.forEach((radio) => {
    radio.addEventListener('change', function () {
      if (!this.checked) return;

      // Remove 'is-checked' from all radios within this form
      radioButtons.forEach((rb) => rb.parentElement.removeAttribute('is-checked'));
      this.parentElement.setAttribute('is-checked', 'true');

      const video = this.parentElement.querySelector('video');
      const thumbnail = this.parentElement.querySelector('img');
      const avatarTechBadge = this.parentElement.querySelector('[avatar-type]')?.outerHTML;

      const largeImage = freeDemoForm.querySelector('.free-demo-large-image');
      largeImage.src = thumbnail?.src || '';
      largeImage.removeAttribute('srcset');
      demoPreviewVideo.setAttribute('poster', thumbnail.src);



      if (video) video.currentTime = 0.1; // Reset video time
      // find the <source> inside the preview video
      const previewSource = demoPreviewVideo.querySelector('source');
      const newSrc =
        this.parentElement.querySelector('source')?.getAttribute('data-src') || '';

      // Set the data-src on the video <source>
      previewSource.setAttribute('data-src', newSrc);

      // Update the src and reload the video only if lazy class has been removed
      if (!demoPreviewVideo.classList.contains('lazy')) {
        previewSource.src = newSrc;
        demoPreviewVideo.load();
      }


      // Pre-fill the textarea and set grey color (add initial-script class)
      const userScript = this.getAttribute('user-script');
      inputScript.value = userScript !== null ? userScript : this.getAttribute('script');
      inputScript.classList.add('initial-script'); // Add grey color class

      stringAvatarName.innerText = this.getAttribute('avatar-name');

      charCount();
    });
  });

  // Initial click to select the first radio option
  radioButtons[0]?.parentElement.click();



  // Character Count and Validation
  function charCount() {
    const charCount = inputScript.value.length;
    charDisclaimer.classList.toggle("warning-red", charCount === 0 || charCount > 200);

    if (charCount === 0) {
      charDisclaimer.innerText = blankMessage;
      disableNext();
    } else if (charCount < 200) {
      charDisclaimer.innerText = `${200 - charCount} ${leftMessage}`;
      enableNext();
    } else if (charCount === 200) {
      charDisclaimer.innerText = fullMessage;
      enableNext();
    } else {
      charDisclaimer.innerText = `${charCount - 200} ${exceededMessage}`;
      disableNext();
    }
  }

  function enforceMaxLength() {
    const maxChars = 200;
    if (inputScript.value.length > maxChars) {
      inputScript.value = inputScript.value.slice(0, maxChars);
    }
    charCount();
  }

  function disableNext() {
    nextButton.setAttribute('disabled', '');
  }

  function enableNext() {
    nextButton.removeAttribute('disabled', '');
  }
	// Updated function to not use slider
	function nextStep() {
		if (inputScript.value.trim()) {
			formStepContainer.setAttribute('free-demo-slider-container', 'step-2');
	  }
	}
	// Updated function to not use slider
	function previousStep() {
		formStepContainer.setAttribute('free-demo-slider-container', 'step-1');
	}

  inputScript.addEventListener('input', enforceMaxLength);
  nextButton.addEventListener('click', nextStep);
  backButton.addEventListener('click', previousStep);

  // Initial Character Count
  charCount();

  // Add the initial grey color when the page loads
  inputScript.classList.add('initial-script');

  // Remove grey color class when the user focuses
  inputScript.addEventListener('focus', function () {
    inputScript.classList.remove('initial-script'); // Remove grey color class
  });

  // Ensure that the user-input class remains as the user types
  inputScript.addEventListener('input', function () {
    if (inputScript.value.trim() !== "") {
      inputScript.classList.remove('initial-script'); // Remove grey color class
    } else {
      inputScript.classList.add('initial-script');    // Add grey color class if field is empty
    }
  });

  // Change placeholder texts on preview thumbs
  function setThumbnailStrings() {
    const textDivs = freeDemoForm.querySelectorAll('[data-text]');
    textDivs.forEach((div) => {
      const text = div.getAttribute('data-text');
      if (text) div.innerText = text;
    });
  }

  setThumbnailStrings();

  freeDemoForm.addEventListener('submit', handleRedirect);

  function handleRedirect(event) {
    event.preventDefault();
    const activeTemplate = freeDemoForm.querySelector('input[name="templateId"]:checked');
    console.log(activeTemplate);
    if (inputScript.value === activeTemplate.getAttribute('script')) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        window.location.href = activeTemplate.parentElement.querySelector('[data-static-redirect]').href;
      }, 3000);  // Wait 3 seconds before redirecting
    } else {
      setTimeout(() => {
        window.location.href = freeDemoForm.querySelector('[data-dynamic-redirect]').href;
      }, 3000);  // Wait 3 seconds before redirecting
    }
  }

  // Add an event listener to the input field for email capture
  inputUserEmail.addEventListener('input', function (event) {
    //console.log(event.target.value); // Optional: Log the updated value to the console
  });

  // Listen for changes in the email input
  inputUserEmail.addEventListener('input', (event) => {
    window.userEmail = event.target.value;
  });
  

  
  
function handleAvatarSliderUpdate() {
  setTimeout(() => {
    const currentSlide = freeDemoForm.querySelector('.embla__slide.is-active');
    const label = currentSlide?.querySelector('label');
    if (label) {
      const radio = label.querySelector('input[type="radio"]');
      if (radio && !radio.checked) {
        // Directly set the radio to checked
        radio.checked = true;
        // Dispatch a change event so any listeners update accordingly
        radio.dispatchEvent(new Event('change', { bubbles: true }));
        console.log('Radio manually updated.');
      }
    }
  }, 100); // you can tweak this delay if necessary
}

    
}); // DOMContentLoaded - End
